title: Quickling
contents: property | Skills | Acrobatics +8, Sleight of Hand +8, Stealth +8, Perception +S
property | Senses | darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15
description | Blurred Movement | Attack rolls against the quickling have disadvantage unless the quickling is incapacitated or restrained.

description | Evasion | If the quickling is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.
description | Multiattack | The quickling makes three dagger attacks.
description | Dagger | Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (ld4 + 6) piercing damage.
